Bosses.Name: Zodiark (Phase 1)
Bosses.Strategy: Watch out for the shape of the runes the boss summons at the edges of the arena. Triangle shape is a cone shaped AoE across the room. Square shape is a half room AoE on the side of the rune. Summoned Behemoths cast a circle AoE around themselves, while snakes cast a line AoE in the direction they're facing.

Mechanics.Name: Exoterikos
Mechanics.Description:
Boss fires a beam to one of the sides of the arena that turns into a rune.

Trinagle shaped rune:
Cone AoE across the room from the rune.
Square shaped rune:
Half room AoE on the side of the rune.

Mechanics.Name: Paradeigma
Mechanics.Description:
Summons one of two possible mechanics:

Behemoths: 
Large circle AoEs around the Behemoths that each take up one quadrant of the arena
Snakes: 
Line AoEs across the platform that take up two quarters of the arena.

Mechanics.Name: Adikia
Mechanics.Description: Boss punches the platform twice, resulting in two massive circle AoEs.

Mechanics.Name: Phlegeton
Mechanics.Description: Three sets of circle AoEs spawn under players.

Bosses.Name: Zodiark (Phase 2)
Bosses.Strategy: After the transition the boss starts rotating the arena below the players. Players must anticipate where AoEs are relocated to. During Astral Eclipse the boss will mark constellations outside of the arena which indicate what sections of the platform will be hit by meteors. Players have to look outside to anticipate this.

Mechanics.Name: Astral Flow
Mechanics.Description:
Used immediately after Paradeigma. 
Boss rotates the arena with the spawned adds, while players are held in place.

Mechanics.Name: Triple Esoteric Ray
Mechanics.Description:
Casts 3 beams that cover the entire arena. 
The order in which magic circles appear indicates the order of the beams being fired.

Mechanics.Name: Algedon
Mechanics.Description: Diagonal dive attack that knocks anyone hit off the platform.

Mechanics.Name: Astral Eclipse
Mechanics.Description:
Boss flies around the arena spawning patterns of stars in specific alignments. These alignments show which areas of the arena are hit by AoEs.
The stars are aligned on a 3x3 grid that is then projected onto the arena from the side where the stars are coming from.

Patterns:
      X   |   X   X   |      X
XXX   |               |   XXX
X         |   X   X   |      X

Mechanics.Name: Trimorphos Exoterikos
Mechanics.Description: Boss casts 3 Exoterikos runes at every other edge of the arena that go off one by one.
